Package minesweeper.field

Class MineField

java.lang.Object
minesweeper.field.MineField
Direct Known Subclasses:
MineField2D
public abstract class MineField
extends java.lang.Object
A mine field data structure used to play MineSweeper
Author:
Ryan Coughlin

  • Constructor Details

    • MineField

      public MineField​(int width, int height)
      Creates MineField with given dimensions. No tile values are initialized.
      Parameters:
      width -
      height -

  • Method Details

    • populateField

      public abstract void populateField​(int mineCount, long randomSeed, java.util.List<Tile> safeTiles)
      populates MineField with mines and sets the value of all tiles.
      Parameters:
      mineCount - Number of mines in MineField.
      randomSeed -
      safeTiles - Tiles that 100% will not spawn a mine.

    • sweep

      public abstract java.util.List<Tile> sweep​(int x, int y)
      Sweeps a tile.

      If this given tile location is empty, All neighboring tiles will be swept as well.

      Parameters:
      x -
      y -
      Returns:
      A list of Tiles whose values were updated during to sweeping.
